subject: Football
lead_paragraph: A civil lawsuit has been filed in Nevada against Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger by a woman accusing him of sexually assaulting her in a Lake Tahoe hotel room in July 2008.
snippet: A civil lawsuit has been filed in Nevada against Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger by a woman accusing him of sexually assaulting her in a Lake Tahoe hotel room in July 2008.
